title: Top Investments to Beat Inflation: Protect Your Paycheck
subtitle: Discover the top three investment strategies to safeguard your finances against inflation, ensuring your earnings retain value and grow over time.
content:
Top Investments to Beat Inflation

Here are the top three investments that you can make today to help you beat inflation before it eats your paycheck alive.

1. Gold

SPDR's GLD fund, with fees of 0.4%. Over the last five years, the value of gold has doubled. That's because the value of gold increases as the purchasing power of the dollar decreases. Gold tends to outpace inflation by about 150%.

2. Real Estate

Crown Castle and Realty Income Group are two examples of real estate investment trusts that are currently paying a forward dividend of 5.6% and 5.9% respectively. That's outpacing inflation by almost 100%.

3. Low-Cost Index Funds

Consider low-cost index funds like Vanguard's VOO or Fidelity's FXAIX, which have fees of 0.015%. Historically, the stock market returns 10%, which will outpace inflation by 300%.

So now you have the tools, now you have the knowledge. Go do your research, have more of your money work for you and not someone else.
